actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to modify the boundaries of the San Juan and San Isabel National Forests in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the exterior boundaries of the San Juan and San Isabel National Forests in the State of Colorado as shown on the U.S. Forest Service maps dated March 1978. Includes such lands falling within these modified boundaries within the National Forest System.

titles.title: A bill to modify the boundaries of the San Juan and San Isabel National Forests in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
